submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        colors = colors + colors[:k - 1]
        n, ret = len(colors), 0
        idx, cur = 1, 1
        while idx < n:
            if colors[idx] == colors[idx - 1]: cur = 1
            else: cur += 1
            if cur >= k: ret += 1
            #print(idx, cur)
            idx += 1
        return ret
